reviewText: Great movie. Funny. Loved the revenge for societal etiquette misdeeds. Kathleen Turner is excellent and plays a June Cleaver type mother who exacts revenge on those who don't use proper protocol for not doing what is etiquette correctness. Mink Stole was great as an upset woman keeps receiving harassing calls. Overall the movie was wonderful. Recommend it!

I would watch it again, though it's a little sillier than I expected.  My Mom thought it was hilarious. I liked at the ending they found out she really was the kind of person she had been accused of being.
Good quality, no scratches. Love this movie.
